text: Bernard Van de Kerckhove (8 July 1941 â€“ 15 September 2015) was a Belgian professional road bicycle racer from 1962 to 1971. He was known for winning the 1964 Tour de France and 1965 Tour de France after which he wore the yellow jersey for two and three stages respectively. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Belgian cyclists Category:People from Hainaut (province) Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: Bernard Van de Kerckhove
